website_summaries.verdict: If you're seeking a sexy but not too extreme Halloween costume, then this swashbuckler outfit fits the bill.
pros: Multiple sizes available, easy to find ideal fit
Comfortable to wear, fabric is breathable
cons: Some pieces fit better than others
Hat can arrive crushed or flattened
Midriff is exposed, but adjustments are possible

customer_reviews.title: Loved how comfortable this costume was
customer_reviews.text: Loved how comfortable this costume was! I'm a bigger girl at 5'9 and 200 lbs. I typically am a size 14/16. I was concerned about the length because Im taller than average, but the California Costumes women's ruffled petticoat perfectly helped to provide a little more length. I did not care for the how the belt that comes with it looks so I did not use. The hat is soft and comes squished in the packaging, but was resolved using an iron over a towel to protect the material. Am very happy I went with this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: I had a child 8wks1d ago and still looked good in this! I felt sexy as well! I ordered a medium! I'm 68 inches and weigh 161 lbs!! I have off guard pics which are always the best! I loved this costume! I got a lot of compliments lol
customer_reviews.author: Demarrius woodard

customer_reviews.title: Loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: Loved this costume! It fit as expected and size chart was right on. I ordered XXL for my curves and it was perfect. I added more conservative clothes under for work, then less for a party the next night. I got compliments from everyone! Sure, it was wrinkled (especially the hat) but with careful steaming and light ironing it was fine. The feather in the hat was not as pictured, but I plan on adding more for the next time I wear it to Gasperilla. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: I LOOOOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This costume has done a body good! I have gotten SO many compliments! I ordered an XL and it fit me great, from the reviews I have read, people were often complaining about the corset not fitting, fyi, it is not supposed to fit, what you do is pull up the skirt to have the effect such as the picture....OH and by the way, I have purchased the petticoat as well, it is cute without it, but the petticoat makes it fuller! Also, the belt is poorly made but I put a safety on it, the hat is terrible but my bf fixed it for me so it all came together!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: It was what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: As expected with only three complaints. 1. The top is so low cut that it was hard to find a bra that didn’t keep showing, still wore it tho lol 2. The hat that came with it wasn’t great so I got a different one. 3. It’s too popular lol everyone on the cruise was wearing it. Apparently we all shop on Amazon haha One other thing i will say. While I think I rocked it best of course. The other women that wore it, what ever the size, it looked pretty good on their body types as well. Oh and my friend had the same one, but she got hers years ago and it’s still in pretty good shape.
customer_reviews.author: luv2travel

customer_reviews.title: Stunning costume, very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was even better than I had expected! As described in other reviews, it did arrive wrinkled (the hat too), but it quickly came out with a little steaming. Since I stand 5'8 120 lbs. with a 34D I went with the small & also purchased a small white petticoat for underneath. This still looks great without the petticoat, but I like the extra va-voom! The quality is very nice and my pirate costume was a huge hit at the party! I highly recommend! P.S. You will have to buy a feather for your hat if you want one, since this doesn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Angelbuny

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on me
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Pirate costume. Fits perfect on me. I purchased the medium size and I am 5'3" 145 lbs. My only complaint is that the top is loose in the front. It would fit better for girls that are small waisted and have large cups like D and up. A little loose if you're a B cup girl. Otherwise looked great on me. I recommend this especially since it came with a lot of pieces for the price. Didn't have to buy anything extra to make my costume look complete. Came with hat, skirt, top, sleeves, and belt. You could buy boots and a sword but it's not really necessary. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrrrr...fun times!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the costume was fantastic. I carefully read through others' reviews before purchasing, so I already knew that the belt and the feather would be crap and not worth using. I ironed the entire costume on the low setting (for silks), and used a thin cloth when I ironed the hat to make sure I wouldn't melt the material. I ordered the extra large, and am glad I didn't try to get anything smaller. I usually wear size 14 - I am 5'4", 190 lbs, size 40 DD chest. Very sexy, received compliments all night!
customer_reviews.author: Allora

customer_reviews.title: Southern Swashbucker
customer_reviews.text: After recently adjusting to being a bigger size after a surgery, costume shopping was a Debbie downer to say the least. - I did not use the skirt, as if worn on the waist it makes one look much wider than they actually are (not cool). -The hat did come a little squished, but even after being packed in the suitcase it "unpopped" itself pretty dang well! -Cuffs were tight as all heck but I am a former rower, so my arms are quite diesel. All in all, I bought a sword, popped on some leggings and POOF went out in Nashville on my Halloween vaca!
customer_reviews.author: Channelalexis

customer_reviews.title: Great sexy pirate costume!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this costume!! I got a lot of compliments on it. I'm 5'9 and 145lbs and got the large, it fit perfectly. Definitely get a petticoat with it to give it that extra flare. The hat of course was flimsy but I steamed it a few days before and it was perfect with the costume. The belt I had to safety pin in place because it kept falling off. For the price it was a great costume that was sexy but not inappropriate. I highly recommend this, just go a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: OK but no more then that
customer_reviews.text: Good quality of fabrics BUT it was way to short for an XL. The top was ok but the skirt?! If i wanted my belly to be cover the skirt is way to short! and also the belt was to tiny, In the end i was wearing the top and the hat with a jeans and that was a real bummer! :\ Not one of my best buy...
customer_reviews.author: sivansh

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price! But get a petticoat!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! I am 5 ft tall and I have a 34 bust, 30 inch waist, and 40 inch hips. This costume fit me great, but like previous reviews I too had trouble with the shirt riding up. I just wore spanx underneath and no one even noticed my shirt was riding up. I would recommend a petticoat to go underneath to give it a little extra umph, because otherwise the costume looks a little "bleh." I worse a black petticoat to go with the black boots I picked out and I got so many compliments. For the price this costume is unbeatable, and my hat wasn't smushed either!
customer_reviews.author: AugustDBrown

customer_reviews.title: Costume that is not too "costume-y"
customer_reviews.text: Loved this outfit! Not too cheap looking like some Halloween costume and I wore it to a huge Pirate Fest and got nods from die hard fans- doesn't have that party look and if you embellish it with some faux fur tails and carry a fake sword, you'll be a hit at every party. Throw in some heels and black boots too to complete the look
customer_reviews.author: Spiritualjiangster

customer_reviews.title: It was nice that the waistband was stretchy/adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 5'6, 190 lbs post baby and got a large. It fit very well in all the right places. It was nice that the waistband was stretchy/adjustable. The top was a little snug, but I think that was on purpose to put the girls on display. I purchased a black petticoat separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ebee Buck

customer_reviews.title: Sexy but not slutty
customer_reviews.text: Sexy but not slutty. True to size; I'm a size 16 & the XXL fits well, and not tight at all. The top is a bit short but nothing that can't be fixed by wearing a wide belt or a cami under it. The skirt elastic band is not tight so plenty room for various body shapes. The hat fits well, but the belt was small, so I used a wide one that I have to avoid the shirt rising. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A few friends said this costume looked like it was movie quality
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of compliments on this costume! Fit very well and washes well in the washer. A few friends said this costume looked like it was movie quality. My only gripe is that the packaging ruined the hat, which was like a thick cotton and it didn’t not bend back or take the form it was supposed to be after taking it out of the costume bag. But the costume itself was great. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: kylie

customer_reviews.title: Sexy and cute but not too revealing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenager and she loves it. The ruffled skirt is very cute and not too revealing, and the quality of the costume is better than most. She is pairing the outfit with over-the-knee boots but ankle boots would work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: happygolucky

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how good this looks. I guess it is just like a Hollywood set-crap, but surprisingly good looking. Especially since it is inexpensive and I don't have to put anymore effort into it than to iron it. Don't use too high a heat or you will melt the fabric. If you iron the vinyl belt, put a piece of cotton fabric over top of it so the iron doesn't touch it or you will have plastic melted all over your iron. I put a piece of Velcro on the belt to hold it in place. And the hat ironed up pretty nice, too. Instead of the skirt, I wore black yoga pants. The husband was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Total Babe
customer_reviews.text: Sexxy. The kind of costume that makes you want to go home and make a ;) movie after all is said and done. I ordered an XL and I’m 5’ 7 and about 210 lbs. It fit perfect. The belt was a little finnicky, but I fixed that with a simple safety pin!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for the price
customer_reviews.text: This costume is great, but apparently it comes up in the search and everyone and their mother, cousin, sister and aunt are also buying it. I bought it and my friend wore the top with one of my own skirts because she doesn't like short skirts and we saw about three other people at the Ren Faire wearing the same darn costume. So, good job for making an awesome costume that fits well and has a good price and prime shipping, but I don't want everyone to have on the same costume. Be prepared to see someone wearing it or jazz it up with other pieces you already own, because seriously, I couldn't believe how many people had it on.
customer_reviews.author: DvaLA

customer_reviews.title: Decent costume, esp. for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for a costume. Arrived quickly. Like others said, the belt is pretty much useless and will have to be pinned if used. The hat is a bit squished from packing. I'm 5'3 and 150lbs, and the large fits well.
customer_reviews.author: PageTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Incredible engineering accomplishment!
customer_reviews.text: This was my wife's winner for this year's Halloween costume. It looks amazing I must say. Obviously the electrical and computer engineers at California Costumes created a time machine so their acquisitions department could find the find an authentic "sexy swashbuckler" outfit from the age of pirates. Many might not care, but I for one really appreciate the efforts they put in to this. Thank you, California Costumes, for going the extra mile.
customer_reviews.author: Crew of the Normandy SR-2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was very cute but the belt did not fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy86

customer_reviews.title: Great looking costume!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium and it is a little big in the bust area. I can make it work because the ribbon in the front makes the shirt adjustable. The belt looks cool, but you'll need a safety pin to make it stay in place. I really like the look of the top and skirt. Be prepared-the skirt is pretty short in the front. I suggest buying an underskirt if you are tall. It also gives the skirt a fuller look, but isn't necessary. The hat and feather were crumpled. I think steam may bring it back to life, but I decided to just order a separate hat. Overall a great looking costume! Definitely worth it-especially at the discounted price!
customer_reviews.author: The Basha

customer_reviews.title: Argh matey!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for "talk like a pirate day" and received tons of compliments. Everyone was astonished when I told them how little I paid for it on amazon. Looks like a much pricier costume. Everything seems well made, however I will agree with everyone else, the hat was smooshed, so I just went without it. Overall, good buy! I'm ~115lb 5'4" and a small fit me perfectly, but seems to have a fair bit of stretch to accommodate slightly larger frames as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Omg, everyone loved my outfit. It was worn at Gasparilla and the weather was in the 50s all day but I was pretty warm in this. I recommend buying ivory or cream colored petticoat, not white. The trimming is a cream color. It wasn't overly sexy which was perfect. Make sure to let the hat sit out for a few days to unbend prior to wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Gil

customer_reviews.title: Best Wench costume out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! I wear a 6-8 and ordered the large (due to the extra junk in the trunk 😉) The hat was a waste, but the rest of the costume was awesome! I also purchased a black hi-Lo petticoat that really was needed to make this costume complete! I think we pulled it off!
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume Choice
customer_reviews.text: This costume is so cute and fits really well. The material is thin enough to be breathable but still is opaque. Nothing was wrong with my costume upon initial inspection and try on. It has a zipper in the back that zips downwards which is super convenient for dressing yourself! I bought a petticoat for underneath and it makes the costume, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffini

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't happy about it either
customer_reviews.text: NOT as it looks on the picture. There is suppose to be an extended (rounded) where the vest is at the top near shoulder, not there at all, straight down and looks plastic and is cut way too high. I am a B cup and this came all the way up to my chin almost. I had to end up cutting it to get the cleavage. Wasn't happy about it either. I am pictured on left and you can see where I had to cut it down.
customer_reviews.author: Chevonne White

customer_reviews.title: The outfit is great but they didn't put hat in there
customer_reviews.text: The outfit is great but they didn't put hat in there, it was missing one sleeve ruffle and top loop on the top, where lace ribbon is, needs to be sown back on. Someone isn't doing their job and doesn't care! Other than those things, great outfit, but be prepared for what it may not come with! Had to order hat separately and going to my seamstress to fix loop where ribbon goes through.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This costume was a big hit, I loved the way it fit and looked on me. I did not wear the belt, I had the back of the skirt taking up so it was the same length as the front. Major hit at parties the entire Halloween weekend. I'm 5'0 140 with small waist and bust and a small fit perfect. I would definitely recommend. Oh instead of boots I put on a sexy pair of heels. Also the hat does come disfigured, but I stuffed it with plastic and it bounced right into shape. All I can say is I loved loved loved this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Zie

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: I'm 265lbs and 5'10 and this fits just slightly tight. The top is tight but the skirt is perfect. Unlike most "sexy" costumes, the skirt is not too short. Definitely a rare find, especially for someone with long legs like me. The belt is kinda cheap looking but I probably won't use it. Beware the top is not padded as I thought it was
customer_reviews.author: aliensca13Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Parrothead tailgate party - it fits great (I'm generally a size 6...why can't we go to using standard measurements for clothing??) I added a push-up bra to make it even bustier and had a great pair of boots to go with it. Wish I had ordered a sword. Anyhow, hundreds of people told me they loved it and lots of people asked to take pictures with me. Best advice - unpack it immediately and let the hat 'fluff' out. This didn't have a crinoline as in the photo but the skirt is just fine (no one is looking at it) I suggest adding a tattoo as well. I had a skull and crossbones.
customer_reviews.author: Waysidelynne

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Fail
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on Tuesday with one day shipping but the order got messed up didn't ship. Now I won't get the order until Friday and probably Friday night. Unfortunately that probably means i can't wear on Friday. I'm furious because even for my Saturday event, I won't have time to go buy accessories. California Costumes knows this is there busy season but failed in an epic fashion. If the costume fits perfectly I may up this to 2 stars but I don't need this kind of stess
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Bergin

customer_reviews.title: Cute without sacrificing comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different pirate costumes before settling on this one. Cute AND comfortable. It didn't feel tight or itchy or annoying anywhere. My only complaint is that the belt material tends to bunch up after you tighten it, totally defeating the purpose of it looking like a thick leather belt.
customer_reviews.author: Flower of Finae

customer_reviews.title: 5'3" ~108 lbs, ordered XS
customer_reviews.text: This costume was just the right amount of sexy! I ordered the X-Small. I'm 5'3" and ~108 lbs with a 32DDD bust. Obviously, the top was a bit tight and small on me, but overall it still looked cute and I knew this would be an issue simply because the market doesn't really cater to petite women with huge breasts. Anywhere from an A-D, you'll do great! The skirt was so adorable. It'll comfortably as high or low as you'd want to make it. Boots are not included! Sword is not included!
customer_reviews.author: Amburger

customer_reviews.title: Other than that wow I love it. I only try it on to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.6'' 148 pounds with a 36D cup PR so I definitely have curves. Went by reviews and bought a L. Fits somewhat Large. If you are in between sizes don't opt for the bigger one. A suggestion to the seller would be allow us ladies to buy maybe one size for the chest and opt for another size for the skirts or vice-versa. Other than that wow I love it. I only try it on to make sure it fits so I have not worn it for long periods of time yet. Cant wait for our Pirates family theme this Halloween. YOu want sexy but not skanky this is the item. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nisce

customer_reviews.title: Belt doesn't fit even for size 2xL
customer_reviews.text: My normal size is 16 and I'm just 5ft I got 2xL which I normally wear 1xL. It's alittle bit lose but if you like to wear lose clothes then it's not bad but if you like to wear tight shirts then I would suggest to get the 1xL. The down part is that the belt doesn't fit. It's too small if only the belt was elastic or stretchy then I would have give it 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Icy Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great costume... Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I posted that this product fits somewhat small. It only fits somewhat small in the bust area. If you're a busty woman I would suggest you order a size up. This costume is really cute on and I received a lot of compliments on it. It's good quality too I will get to wear it several times. The belt was entirely too small. But I took it and used it as a hat band on the hat along with the feather and it looked really cute that way. You can see the belt buckle in the picture on the hat. I definitely recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Like the reviews before said, the hat sucks, but I knew that before I purchased the product. It looks great on! I also purchased the petticoat separate, because I read the reviews about the skirt being too short. Everyone was spot on. I'd like to thank previous reviewers, because they let me know exactly what I was getting into! It's also comfortable. I got the large size to be safe. I fit into a juniors 9, but I realistically could probably have gotten a medium. I'm 5' 4" and 145 lbs(at least thats what the scale says and we all know they lie! ;) )if that helps anyone. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Cloverhoof

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Busty Gal
customer_reviews.text: Fit is approximately size 14 in my opinion (larger than I expected), and can accommodate a large bust. Might want to wear camisole underneath for a family event because it is revealing. The skirt has an elastic waist so really it can fit a wider range of sizes on the lower half. Overall, it was too big for the lower half but it was fine because of the elastic. The pettiskirt pictured was not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P. Willhite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a HUGE hit! I bought a ruffled pettiskirt to wear underneath and it was adorable. The hat was squished and I couldn't make it look right, but wore it anyway. I dressed it up a little with a belly dancer skirt that had what looked like pirate tokens that added a some awesome flair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I know it’s a Halloween costume, but as cute as it looks online, this was very cheaply made. Definitely not worth the money spent. I actually ended up going with something else instead this year despite purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was a winner. My only complaint is that the belt was way too short. Should be more flexible or longer for chunkier body types.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Girl

customer_reviews.title: The costume does not look exactly like the package
customer_reviews.text: The costume does not look exactly like the package. The size runs small, chest is not very showy, the strings do not tie all the way up like in the picture, the top does not go down to the skirt (shows mid-drift), the hat arrived crushed, and the belt does not stay in place. I plan to make some alterations to make this work, but was overall not impressed with the product. I'm giving three stars for speedy shipping and an overall good company, as I ordered some other things from them.
customer_reviews.author: DRA

customer_reviews.title: Overall good costume
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good costume for the price. I wear a 6-8 and the Medium fit me well. I got it about a week before Halloween so I had time to lay my smushed up hat out to let it reshape but no luck, it never would get back to normal so I did without it. The belt has no hook on the buckle so it constantly comes loose so I did without it too. The ruffle skirt underneath really helps give the costume some life, highly recommend purchasing that because it does not come with.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Was made nice but the top was way way to small. The bottom fit perfectly. I’m 5’9” and about 170lbs. If you don’t mind showing your tummy then go for it. Not for me. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and I LOVE IT 😍 I got a size small, I weigh 119 lbs with 34C cup...it fit perfectly! I am very impressed with the quality too, I didn't expect that. Not itchy at all! The top has a zipper in the back! Truly, I have never been so happy with a custume! I also ordered a petti coat, it arrives next week & I am so glad o ordered it because I really like the way it looked on the model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I paired this with leggings to make it more appropriate ...
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with leggings to make it more appropriate to wear out in public. Without the leggings you would have a mid drift top if you wore the skirt and the waist. If you pulled the skirt up to meet the top then you risk exposing yourself. Wore this to a pirate themed family party. The hat was actaully a bit flimsy so I paired it with another hat purchased from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, absolute junk.
customer_reviews.text: The top was an awkward fit, it was slightly tight, but too big from the shoulder to bust. Also, when I put it on, I noticed that one of the loopholes on the front was already broken. Overall, not happy. Talk about cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Sutter14

customer_reviews.title: Best pirate costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! I had to order a size down to get the costume in time, but it still fit. I definitely recommend getting a petticoat for underneath the skirt so you don't accidentally flash people all night. Like others, the belt was weird and I didn't wear it. Give the hat a couple days to fluff up and it will look good.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Higgins

customer_reviews.title: 5'3", large bust, bought a small. Fit great
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" with a rather large bust. I bought a small knowing it may be a bit snug. It fit me great! It does come with a hat, which surprised me. I'm giving it 4 stars because the top loop on the bust was already broken when I bought it, so I cut off the matching one and laced up the rest of them. You would never know it was missing the top loops. This a costume I am going to wear again. It was sexy but not slutty.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This was by far one of my best costumes, the fit was great and costume didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was by far one of my best costumes, the fit was great and costume didn't look like your typical cheap costume. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Claudia  I.

customer_reviews.title: My bust was busting out.
customer_reviews.text: I know the measurement around my bust.... I ordered my size and when I put the costume on it was busting out. I ending up cutting the fabric in the front and wore a tang top under and then just laced up the front in order to zip up the back. The rest all fit fine but if you have a large cup/bust I wouldn’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Cesely

customer_reviews.title: Great ladies pirate costume
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good fitting costume, arrived as expected, the hat gets z little squished in the package, set aside time for it to be formed, recommend stuffing it with tissue paper to reshape overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Weitzel

customer_reviews.title: It was super tight, I'm 5'4
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for a halloween last minute, It arrived in a timely matter. I was excited tried it on and got the white skirt to go underneath it as well. I normally wear a medium in tops but when I tried it on. It was super tight, I'm 5'4,130lbs and have a DD chest. The bottom was too big on me and the back tail was long even we the white goofy thing under it. There was no buckles on the costume as it shows in the picture. If you are very chesty, maybe order the next size up. I'm returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenkind8

customer_reviews.title: Great little costume for the pricce
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little costume especially for the price. I was really happy with it and got a ton of positive comments about it. My female friends were shocked it came from amazon. As many before have said, the shirt is a little short and I ended up wearing a camisole underneath just to make me feel better. I recommend buying the pettiskirt for under the skirt mostly just to complete the outfit but the skirt itself is fine without it. Not saying this is top quality but it survived the night and will be fine to wear again another year or 2. I highly recommend it and would certainly buy another costume from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I'm fine with that
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1", 120 pounds, 32DD and the size small fit me perfectly. The top is not as low cut as I had expected, but I'm fine with that. The front of the skirt is a little above mid-thigh for me. I bought a petticoat tulle and it completed the costume. The belt is really cheap - the costume looks fine without it. Probably going to steam the hat because it was smushed the way it was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: For $30 it's a great costume for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: For $30 it's a great costume for what I needed. The hat wasn't great, as it's made a felt. All the the costume needed a quick iron before use to get the wrinkles out. I also utilized a small piece of Velcro to keep the belt in place. The petticoat isn't needed, but for an additional couple dollars it complimented the outfit nicely. I really liked that the back of skirt is longer. I am 5'3/115 and the small fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: BrookeInBlue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I noticed in alot of the reviews on this costume that people would complain the white part of the skirt was missing. If you read the product description it does Not come w/the peticoat. It is good quality, I am 5'4 my dress size states according to te package i should have gotten a small but good thing I actually found this costume in store and was able to try it on b/c it does run a tiny bit small (only in top) so I got a medium and it fits perfect. I saved about $20 ordering this from amazon and I am very happy with my purchas.
customer_reviews.author: T8rsWife

customer_reviews.title: Sexy pirate for life
customer_reviews.text: California costumes are always a hit. Well made enough that I can actually wear more than once. I paired w/ the petti skirt or you just don't get the same look as in the picture. Cute w/ some knee high boots!
customer_reviews.author: Andy S

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted! I was so excited when I got this in the mail and of course I had to immediately put it on. Fits perfectly! I do need to put a safety pin on the belt to keep it tight but it's awesome! As I read I will need to steam the hat. Of course it comes squished because it was mailed not hand delivered....that's really all I have to say....oh and it helps to have boobs haha the top is low cut. I'm adding a bandeux to wear underneath. I'm so excited to wear this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Top is way too short
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for me .. looks like the top would cover your mid section but my belly was completely showing .. belt wouldn’t have stayed on because there is nothing to fasten it. Fairly cute costume would love it if the top actually fit and if it was way longer
customer_reviews.author: Barbie the Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Aargh!! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am so used to buying costumes for outrageous prices, but this was not bad at all and the costume quality was much better than some others that I have tried. It fit just right. I am 5'5, 150 lbs. This is also the most complete looking costume I have seen in a while. I bought the petticoat as well, and it looks great with or without. I absolutely love it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Soto

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart when I got it...
customer_reviews.text: When the costume arrived the left side of the top was peeling, the other side was completely fine. It was to late to order a new costume so I wore it anyway but it was quite noticeable. Other than that, the costume was cute and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bri B.

customer_reviews.title: Double check sizing chart/look online for better measurements
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The sizing chart is different now than when I ordered..? But it still technically fits, the top is just a bit snug so... Going off it now i could have ordered a xxl and it would have been more comfortable. The hat is crap. lol belt doesnt fit but then again it's a size too small so that makes sense. Quality wise its a good costume.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great for a party
customer_reviews.text: LOVED it. I was a bit worried by some of the reviews but it was great. The feather was smaller than I expected but oh well. I had to pin the top to my bra because it kept sliding down a bit but other than that, no complaints. I wear a 14 dress size and the XXL fit perfect with and without shapewear. I got so many compliments on this costume. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Petticoat would be nice addition to buy too
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume. It was a little tight but because of my chest not because of the cut. I had to return it because the party was c ce,led but would have exchanged for a larger size if it had t been. Very cute. Petticoat would be nice addition to buy too.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Hit at the party!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is a super sexy get up but also not slutty. I wore this at a costume party and it was a hit. I found that the lace up front easily comes unstitched so watch out for that when you are lacing up. The hat was pretty bent out of shape, but nothing that a little steam couldn't fix. Over all this fit perfectly. I ordered a medium and I am 5"5' 135 pounds 34D.
customer_reviews.author: doejubois

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume so much! It came just in time for a Halloween party I went to last night. (Party was thrown a week earlier because me and a friend have something going on on Halloween weekend.) Everyone loved how the costume looked on me. I got so many compliments! I definitely recommend this costume. I'm 5'3 tall and 120 pounds. I got a small size. And I had to buy the tutu separately, size small/medium. Oh and I bought a little sword to complete the costume. I have no complaints. The hat came smushed in the packaging but no problem because I fixed it! And the belt fit great. The costume gives you great cleavage too lmao!
customer_reviews.author: Katerine Centeno

customer_reviews.title: but I think it would have been fine without it
customer_reviews.text: I wore this on our Disney Cruise and got tons of compliments! I bought a petti coat to go under it too, but I think it would have been fine without it. I just like a little puffiness. I am hoping the kids want to be pirates for Halloween, so I have an excuse to wear it again!
customer_reviews.author: kelatkinson

customer_reviews.title: Costume condition subpar
customer_reviews.text: While I enjoy the style and the look unfortunately part of the costume were either missing, not displayed properly, or damaged. I couldn’t find a way to simply contact the seller for replacement pieces. I may have to return it but fear it may happen again. The buckle looked chipped or damaged and the red ribbon features in the vest/top is missing. This wasn’t a cheap costume. I expected better. That being said the fabric is decent quality. Except the flimsy felt hat.
customer_reviews.author: Justacurlygurl who loves to listen 📚

customer_reviews.title: The belt doesn't really work so I recommend getting a real belt if you want to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: The costume was a big hit. It fit perfectly. The belt doesn't really work so I recommend getting a real belt if you want to wear one. I just went without.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this one would be toooo sexy BUT it was perfect!! the length was good if you lace ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my daughter and actually was worried this one would be toooo sexy BUT it was perfect!! the length was good if you lace the top all the way up the coverage on the chest area was good!! She has worn this a few times and actually plans on keeping this one cause she wouldnt mind wearing it a few times more!
customer_reviews.author: NANCY O.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job matey!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't breathe real well as it's a generically made costume, but great for a party. Don't buy it last minute, it needs ironing and the hat needs fluffing. Also, I suggest the petticoat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lividoll

customer_reviews.title: I know its a "sexy" costume so its not like its way out in left field
customer_reviews.text: Its a 1/2 type of thing. The skirt is very short, I know its a "sexy" costume so its not like its way out in left field, but it is considerably shorter than then picture shows. Honestly, the skirt isn't usable but the top is fantastic. The top looks really cool and fits well, just need some shirt under it to get the look you want complete as the little arm dress pieces are kinda annoying and not practical. So, its a 1/2 good 1/2 bad, but still 4 stars as I think the top will get many uses.
customer_reviews.author: FORREST C RICHMOND

customer_reviews.title: It will do
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume. Exactly what I need for my upcoming party. I ordered a size larger than normal because I would need extra coverage in the skirt. My only issue is the hat arrived crushed. I have to figure out how to get the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of compliments on this costume as it was flattering and well made. It's great that you really get to (almost) complete the look with one purchase. I bought a white petticoat to give the skirt the look from the picture. The belt is completely worthless as it does not fasten and just falls off. Not to mention I think the courset lace detail looked better without being covered by a belt. Fortunately I did have a positive experience with the hat. I was worried about it based on other reviews. It was a little crumpled when I received it, but after straightening it out a bit, it looked fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Furr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Costume, I just wish it could have worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was beautiful! I loved the way it fit, however I was not able to wear it due to it being extremely low cut, which definitely was not going to work for me! The material was high quality and the accessories were just adorable! I honestly could see myself wearing the skirt as a regular outfit! My only recommendation is that if you are larger chested like myself, order a size up or find a way to incorporate an undershirt if you don't want to be hanging out all night!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa W.

customer_reviews.title: The costume is pretty cute. The skirt is meant to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: The costume is pretty cute. The skirt is meant to be a high wasted skirt so the top is short. I ordered a size small and it fit perfect. I'm 5'2" & 120 lbs. The quality is decent for a costume. The hat looks a lot better in the picture though.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: At a Halloween store they were selling this custome for $60. This was a great deal And it fits as expected. Hat and belt are not top quality, but still good value. You can reshape hat by getting out earlier and you stich or use velcro to make belt stay. The ruffles, plus the petticoat underneath (extra $) give a nice touch. Pretty much makes your behind look with nice volume.
customer_reviews.author: sofia m.c.

customer_reviews.title: just as expected; hat needs fix.
customer_reviews.text: The costume fit right along with the other reviews. The top seemed a little short but was expected from the reviews. I wore for a few hours and could not seem to get the belt to stay snug without having to wrap it around it's self on the side of my waist. I was a little disappointed in the hat as it was not sewn in the same places as the picture and therefore it was not usable for the costume. I did not want to remove and restitch the already sewn areas. The hat would have been a great accessory. Overall, the costume was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Pirate!
customer_reviews.text: Great pirate costume! I ordered a medium and it fit great. I am 5"7 140lbs, size 6. I bought a petticoat to wear under the skirt which made the costume perfect. The belt doesn't stay on, but it is just for looks anyways. I added some tape to keep the belt on. The hat came crumpled up (expected) but it was easy to steam into shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: ... (due to my full C chest ) but even like that it "fit" around the torso area but was ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a M/L so decided to order the L (due to my full C chest ) but even like that it "fit" around the torso area but was def snug on the girls and the fabric itself pulling in weird directs. The top/shirt part of costume doesn't have the length as the pic shows as I'm 5'8" and the sides of shirt barely touched my hip. Skirt is puffy on it's own anymore would be an exaggeration. Sadly wouldn't be using this and to late to return it
customer_reviews.author: Customer80

customer_reviews.title: I love this costume
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume! It's sexy without being too revealing. I'm 5'4, 135 lbs and a 34DD chest and the medium fit perfect! The only thing I did to alter was to add a thicker burgundy ribbon to the front as opposed to the thin red one that comes with it. I ordered the white skirt thing to go under it and it looks great. I have read others reviews about the hat being smashed but I really didn't have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this costume was a huge hit! My friends complimented me all night. I'm 5'5", about 160lbs and 36C. I ordered a large and it fit perfect! All I had to do was throw on some boots I already had and outfit complete! My only complaint would be the belt; it wouldn't stay closed since it's like a vinyl fabric it kept slipping off so I had to safety pin it on.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good product but I don't like the material it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I don't like the material it is made out if. For the inside of the shirt, it could have been lined with something less itchy. The skirt I had no problems with and the shoulder cuffs fit fine but they were also made from a scruffy material that was itchy. I feel it wasn't worth as much as I paid for but it worked as a costume.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Love costume and came in with good timing
customer_reviews.text: Love costume and came in with good timing. Only problem was the top corset part didn't come with the red string to make it look like a corset, and the hat was extremely squished so I was never able to wear the hat... I couldn't get it to look right. But overall, I am still satisfied and enjoyed wearing it. One of my favorite costumes despite those 2 issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. C.

customer_reviews.title: You’d better be busty!
customer_reviews.text: Not for petite upper-bodied ladies. Had to use a couple of safety pins to keep the blouse from showing off all my stuff. We are talking gaping flaps of unuseful material. Otherwise, this is a very nice costume and a good value item!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: ... but the hat was - lets be honest - pathetic. I didn't know what was going on with ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated five stars but the hat was - lets be honest - pathetic. I didn't know what was going on with the hat. And the feather was...lets just say...lacking life. There was no fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price and the costume was super sexy. I stuffed the hat with newspaper and ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price and the costume was super sexy. I stuffed the hat with newspaper and steamed it back into shape, swapped out the belt for a wider leather belt with rivets and the whole thing looked amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: not quite the quality i expected but not unwearable, ...
customer_reviews.text: not quite the quality i expected but not unwearable, the hat however is way to small and is squished to all hell and the feather wasnt even attached so idk, its also off white not that it really matters but maybe i got an old one
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It fits absolutely perfectly. It's so cute. I loved it immediately. I doubt very seriously I could've found something better at Party City or anywhere else. All you need is some boots and you're good to go, it comes with everything you need. I'm usually a size like, 13-14 and I got an extra large. It fits sooo good. The little belt thing was too small but I liked the outfit without it anyways. The hat needed to be fixed and smoothed out, but that's expected. Over all, I am sooo obsessed with it and I can't wait to wear it <3
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Definately not made for apple shaped gal. The skirt is much larger than the top for me but it is gorgeous and we'll made. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI R JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Argh! :)
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a big hit at the Halloween party and I looked like a convincing pirate girl. I did buy the under piece, a white petticoat from Leg Avenue costumes. All in all, a terrific look for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Kate and Doug Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Good for price!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Followed the size chart and it fit perfect -- I'm about 5'3 and the skirt was right about at the middle of thighs, I have 32DDD chest and those fit in fine. Hat was kind of flimsy, wish I bought a different one but overall it was really cute and the price was good!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: Received sexy pirate costume today. Fits perfect, don't even bother with the hat that is included with the costume. However, the package looked like it had been ran over by a truck. And the white arm sleeves are missing. Waiting to hear from the seller, masquerade Halloween. Will do a follow up review once I hear back on how this is going to be handled.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fit was good. Quality was good
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good. Quality was good. I had to steam the hat to get it to look good. There is no stretch to this fabric so if you are busty order up a size! The belt was garbage but other than that it was a great looking costume!
customer_reviews.author: mom to 2 divas

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume - minus the Hat
customer_reviews.text: This costume is cute/sexy and well made ... but take it from me ... the hat ( weird fabric covered foam ) will be so crushed and deformed that it will be unwearable . In the end ... without wearing the hat ... no body will ever guess you're a pirate ! So unless you buy a separate hat or have one , this costume isnt good . too bad though because it fits well . ( 5'8" / 130 lb / 34 c )
customer_reviews.author: Fire

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase, no regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Top did indeed run fairly short. However, the rest fit very well. Bought the petticoat made by the same company and it really did complete the costume! The costume was so comfortable that I didn't notice I wore it all night. I loved everything about this costume: the price, the look, how comfortable it was and how well it fit (despite the top being a tad too short).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: California Costumes Women's Sexy Swashbuckler Pirate Costume
product_meta.description: An adventurous high seas costume. This adventurous costume features a grommet trimmed bodice that elegantly frames the neck line. While the tri-layered skirt is longer in the back for a sexy swagger. Costume includes the pirate hat, detachable ruffled sleeves and belt with skull buckle. Sword, bracelet, and shoes not included. White pettiskirt sold separately.
feature_bullets: Pirate costume featuring feathered hat, detachable ruffle sleeves, sleeveless top with lace-up bodice, high/low skirt, and belt with skull buckle
Sword, bracelet, shoes, and white pettiskirt not included
